summary: Using only a hammer and a chisel, a man spends twenty-two years carving a road through a treacherous mountain.
cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Radhika Apte|Ashutosh Acharya|Shahzad Ahmad|Aishwarya Arora|Suraj Bajjua|Vishwa Bhanu|Ravi Bhushan|Anil Chaudhary|Abhishek Chauhan|Samvedna Anish Choudhary|Tigmanshu Dhulia|Gaurav Dwivedi|Amar Gaikwad|Vijay Gupta|Ashraf Ul Haq|Ashraful Haq|Trushant Ingle|Sheikh Noor Islam|Banwari Lal Jhol|Akbar Khan|Kunal Kumar|Rahul Kumar|Sudarshan Kumar|Chandani Kumari|Hema Kumari|Pooja Kumari|Urmila Mahanta|Brahma Mishra|Prashant Narayanan|Sneha Pallavi|Gulshan Pandey|N.K. Pant|Nand Pant|Sulekha Rani|Jagat Rawat|Deepa Sahi|Vishwas Sakat|Rashaana Shah|Kriti Jyotsna Sharma|Harshad Shinde|Mahendra Shrivas|Lata Shukla|Yashvardhan Singh|Basant Sinha|Varadraj Swami|Pankaj Tripathi|Ghama Verma|Dnyanesh Wadekar|Rajeev Yadav
title: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
